headline.main: INONU TELLS HOPE OF AIDING PEACE; But Finds Prospects Slight Belligerents Will Accept Turkey's Good Offices

lead_paragraph: ANKARA, Turkey, Nov. 1 (U.P.) -- President Ismet Inonu said today that Turkey -- "an oasis of peace amid the flames of war" -- would be happy if she could become "a source of the peace for which the entire universe longs."

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
